languages.text: "Десятком местных выродков меньше. Немного — относительно преступлений этого места перед Человечеством. Но все равно приятно".
languages.translation_comment: Killed the Bloodstained Proselytes in the arena.

traits.locale_text: "Десятком местных выродков меньше. Немного — относительно преступлений этого места перед Человечеством. Но все равно приятно".

languages.text: "That's a dozen fewer miscreants on these streets. Not much, considering the scale of this place's crimes against Humanity. Still feels good, though."
languages.translation_comment: Killed the Bloodstained Proselytes in the arena.
languages.original_text: "Десятком местных выродков меньше. Немного — относительно преступлений этого места перед Человечеством. Но все равно приятно".

traits.locale_text: "That's a dozen fewer miscreants on these streets. Not much, considering the scale of this place's crimes against Humanity. Still feels good, though."
"That's a dozen fewer miscreants on these streets. Not much, considering the scale of this place's crimes against Humanity. Still feels good, though."
"That's a dozen fewer miscreants on these streets. Not much, considering the scale of this place's crimes against Humanity. Still feels good, though."

"That's a dozen fewer miscreants on these streets. Not much, considering the scale of this place's crimes against Humanity. Still feels good, though."
"That's a dozen fewer miscreants on these streets. Not much, considering the scale of this place's crimes against Humanity. Still feels good, though."

languages.text: 「これで通りのならず者が十数人減ったな。まあ、人類に対するこの惑星の罪の規模を考えれば、大したことではないが。とはいえ、やはり悪くない気分だ」
languages.original_text: "That's a dozen fewer miscreants on these streets. Not much, considering the scale of this place's crimes against Humanity. Still feels good, though."

traits.locale_text: 「これで通りのならず者が十数人減ったな。まあ、人類に対するこの惑星の罪の規模を考えれば、大したことではないが。とはいえ、やはり悪くない気分だ」

languages.text: "Ein Dutzend weniger Missgeburten auf den Straßen. Nicht viel, wenn man das Ausmaß der hiesigen Verbrechen gegen die Menschheit bedenkt. Aber dennoch ein gutes Gefühl."
languages.original_text: "That's a dozen fewer miscreants on these streets. Not much, considering the scale of this place's crimes against Humanity. Still feels good, though."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Dutzend weniger Missgeburten auf den Straßen. Nicht viel, wenn man das Ausmaß der hiesigen Verbrechen gegen die Menschheit bedenkt. Aber dennoch ein gutes Gefühl."

languages.text: « Voilà qui fait une dizaine de scélérats en moins dans ces rues. Ce n'est pas grand-chose, à l'échelle des crimes de ce lieu contre l'humanité, mais cela reste gratifiant. »
languages.original_text: "That's a dozen fewer miscreants on these streets. Not much, considering the scale of this place's crimes against Humanity. Still feels good, though."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà qui fait une dizaine de scélérats en moins dans ces rues. Ce n'est pas grand-chose, à l'échelle des crimes de ce lieu contre l'humanité, mais cela reste gratifiant. »

languages.text: «Una docena de bellacos menos en estas calles. No es gran cosa, habida cuenta de la magnitud de los crímenes contra la Humanidad que aquí se perpetran. Pero de todos modos sienta bien».
languages.original_text: "That's a dozen fewer miscreants on these streets. Not much, considering the scale of this place's crimes against Humanity. Still feels good, though."

traits.locale_text: «Una docena de bellacos menos en estas calles. No es gran cosa, habida cuenta de la magnitud de los crímenes contra la Humanidad que aquí se perpetran. Pero de todos modos sienta bien».

languages.text: “这样一来，这里的渣滓又少了十几个。考虑到这里是渣滓的老巢，这只能算是九牛一毛，不过感觉还是挺不错的。”
languages.original_text: "That's a dozen fewer miscreants on these streets. Not much, considering the scale of this place's crimes against Humanity. Still feels good, though."

traits.locale_text: “这样一来，这里的渣滓又少了十几个。考虑到这里是渣滓的老巢，这只能算是九牛一毛，不过感觉还是挺不错的。”

languages.text: "Sokakları bu sefillerden bir nebze temizlemiş olduk. Burada İnsanlığa karşı işlenen suçları düşününce az bile. Yine de hiç yoktan iyidir."
languages.original_text: "That's a dozen fewer miscreants on these streets. Not much, considering the scale of this place's crimes against Humanity. Still feels good, though."

traits.locale_text: "Sokakları bu sefillerden bir nebze temizlemiş olduk. Burada İnsanlığa karşı işlenen suçları düşününce az bile ama hiç yoktan iyidir."

languages.original_text: "That's a dozen fewer miscreants on these streets. Not much, considering the scale of this place's crimes against Humanity. Still feels good, though."
